column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My friends and I shared the Chicago Classic with additional garlic
column4: and it ended up being the best deep dish pizza I had ever had. The crust was the perfect density: firm on the bottom
column5: and crunchy on the edges. The sausage was juicy
column7: and probably the best sausage on a pizza I've ever tasted. The toppings were arranged well: the sausage was laid out in strips
column8: and every bite was packed with flavor. Mushrooms. Garlic. Sausage. Spinach. Cheeeeeese. Mmmm!
